text: Lyudmila Pavlovna Suslina (; born 5 October 1946) is a Russian former pair skater who represented the Soviet Union. With Alexander Tikhomirov, she is the 1968 Winter Universiade bronze medalist. The pair also won silver at the 1967 Blue Swords, silver at the 1967 Prize of Moscow News, and gold at the 1968 Blue Swords. == References == Category:1946 births Category:Russian female pair skaters Category:Soviet female pair skaters Category:Living people Category:Figure skaters from Moscow Category:Universiade medalists in figure skating Category:Universiade bronze medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Competitors at the 1968 Winter Universiade
title: Lyudmila Suslina
